posts.post_content:
Graded or ungraded, fair-good condition or PSA 6, doesn't really matter. As long as the card is presentable. I have a wide range of needs; some are to fill holes, others are upgrades.

Please PM or [URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]email me[/URL] what you have available with prices. If you'd rather trade, that's fine, too. I have some AB's. Cycles and a Broad Leaf, along with some other less-common backs.

Thanks, Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]

Hi Rob

I'll be sending you a PM shortly. I may have a PB for you.


Jantz

Rob

I hava available 15 - Polar Bear cards (for sale or trade).

Email me at......

[url]tedzan11@comcast.net[/url]

Ted Z
I am interested in the ABs, Cycles and the Broad Leaf. Don't think I have any Polar Bears for you though. PM sent.

Please PM or [URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]email me[/URL] what you have available with prices. If you'd rather trade, that's fine, too. I have some AB's. Cycles and a Broad Leaf, along with some other less-common backs.

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL][/QUOTE]

I have a large assortment of ungraded Polar Bear backs, but they're not in the greatest condition, which is acceptable because we all know that Polar Bear was scrap or loose tobacco.
I have a Snodgrass batting SGC 60 listed for sale in this section - very tough grade/back/player combo.
